pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, July 5, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, July 5, 2016:

Montréal, Quebec

10:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister and the Premier of Quebec, Philippe Couillard, will make an announcement. A joint media availability will follow.

Stinson Bus Garage
Société de transport de Montréal
635 Stinson Street
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.


11:40 a.m.  The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with Premier Couillard.

Stinson Bus Garage
Société de transport de Montréal
635 Stinson Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
